metadata.title: CVE-2015-4707 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in IPython before 3.2 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectorsinvolving JSON error messages and the /api/notebooks path.

criterions.comment: ipython: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
